goals: Analyze with entropy scanning, sensitive comment detection, wordlist generation, daily endpoint change detection
Maintain clean code and clarity of design
Prefer server-side rendering (SSR) with Templ over JavaScript

workflow.templ: Always regenerate Templ files whenever a template is changed
workflow.binary: Always build the Go binary once a coding task is finished

templ.rule: Default to Templ for UI rendering

htmx.rule: Prefer HTMX for fetching, interactivity, and UI updates
htmx.patterns: Follow HTMX official examples at https://htmx.org/examples/

alpine.rule: Use Alpine.js inline styles instead of <script> tags

javascript.restriction: No front-end frameworks beyond HTMX + Alpine

general_rules: Do not refactor the User Interface unless explicitly asked
